alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Lafayette; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lafayette, northeastern Wakulla, eastern Gadsden, Jefferson, Taylor, Leon, southern Madison, southeastern Decatur and southwestern Grady Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front along a line extending from near Havana to 6 miles north of Tallahassee Community College to 13 miles southwest of Monticello to 10 miles north of Perry to Dowling Park. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. Thunderstorms are occurring behind this line. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, perhaps ahead of any thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Mayo, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Perry, Midway, Florida A and M, St. Marks, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Greenville, Lee, Lake Bradford, Cody, Wakulla Springs and Florence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Lafayette; Leon; Madison
